name: PINK ELEPHANT
description:
PINK ELEPHANT - is a game about an unknown hero who decided to challenge the forces of a mysterious sect located underground. Explore the mysterious structure and sweep away everyone who gets in your way. The game has 15 levels, a final boss, 4 types of weapons.

Features of the game:
- Pixel graphics
- Hero weapon upgrade system
- Final Boss
- After killing the final boss, a new game mode opens
